subject: Re: Automated XML Validation with JUnit?
msgSnippet: ... Xmlunit is nice for its purpose but doesn t fit my use-case well. What I want to do is validation of files that are essential parts of an application - and
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, James Abley <james.abley@...> wrote:
>
> Xmlunit would help, within the constraints of JAXP.
>

Xmlunit is nice for its purpose but doesn't fit my use-case well. What
I want to do is validation of files that are essential parts of an
application - and have that integrated into JUnit.

Regards
Murat
